subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With the Royals having ended a 28-year absence by making the 2014 baseball playoffs, the Blue Jays, at 21 years, now own the futility streak for major North American leagues.
snippet: With the Royals having ended a 28-year absence by making the 2014 baseball playoffs, the Blue Jays, at 21 years, now own the futility streak for major North American leagues.
